title: Why is this even here?
body:
https://i.gyazo.com/068c878a96112a919eec7bc8fe0c03d5.png

Who decided that it would be wise to place a pop-up that cannot be closed over vital information?

replies.body:
You know whats more annoying 

IF SOMEONE DECLINES WHY ARE WE STILL WAITING FOR THE REST OF THE 10 PLAYERS TO ACCEPT OR DECLINE.

Its better than the last one which always left a notification in the bottom corner, that you had to press like 3 buttons to get rid of, every single time.

The new one goes away after 3 or so seconds anyway, without any effort on your behalf.
Plus it only covers the store and loot, neither of which are really useful when waiting for a game anyway, as both require time, and are best when not interrupted.
